title: Crack-induced abrupt capacity degradation in commercial LiNi0.8Co0.1Mn0.1O2 (NCM811)/SiOx-graphite pouch batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19116-19123
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01738B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xianying Zhang, Qiyu Wang, Yu Li, Guochen Sun, Xiqian Yu, Hong Li
Reasons for abrupt capacity fading in commercial LiNi0.8Co0.1Mn0.1O2 (NCM811)/SiOx-graphite pouch batteries were evaluated using electrochemical methods and some advanced verification techniques.
